Texts.Chs: 军事机构部署的一个战斗用空间站。作为一个（合法的）购买武器和雇用船员的地方。
Texts.Eng: A battle station deployed by military agencies. Serves as a (legal) place to purchase weaponry, and hire crew.

Texts.Chs: 一个由科技发展部操控的深空武装平台，用于从轨道上发射核弹打击天体。
Texts.Eng: A deep space weapons platform staffed by the Miniknog, used to nuke celestial bodies from orbit.

Texts.Chs: 莱西亚公司旗下的一支星际舰队。极其危险，为了保守公司机密不惜杀戮。
Texts.Eng: A fleet of starships belonging to the Letheia Corporation. Extremely dangerous and more than willing to kill to preserve corporate secrets.

Texts.Chs: 一间空间站，专门用于交易货物和接受利润投资。
Texts.Eng: A space station dedicated to trading items and goods, as well as accepting investments for benefits.

Texts.Chs: 这间空间站提供医疗用品，以及持久的身体增强剂。
Texts.Eng: A space station offering medical supplies, as well as long lasting body enhancers.

Texts.Chs: 一座充满着狂热嗜杀者的翼族航天建筑物，金字塔是翼族人最喜欢的传统样式。
Texts.Eng: An avian spacefaring structure full of murderous zealots. Pyramids are a traditional favourite.

Texts.Chs: 翼族金字塔
Texts.Eng: Avian Pyramid

Texts.Chs: 小憨堡
Texts.Eng: Burger Fool

Texts.Chs: 叶族蜱虫养殖场
Texts.Eng: Floran Ixoling Grounds

Texts.Chs: 星际医疗站
Texts.Eng: Galactic Medical Care Station

Texts.Chs: 星际贸易站
Texts.Eng: Galactic Trade Station

Texts.Chs: 机械族技术巫师塔
Texts.Eng: Glitch Technowizard Tower

Texts.Chs: 蜱虫养殖业是叶族之中长期以来备受遵从的行业，奇怪的是——这项事业最适合在太空中进行。
Texts.Eng: Ixoling husbandry is a long-standing and respected profession amongst Floran - and oddly enough, best carried out in space.

Texts.Chs: 军事演习场
Texts.Eng: Military Battlestation

Texts.Chs: 秘传佛塔
Texts.Eng: Mysterious Pagoda

Texts.Chs: 这是霍格沃兹技术巫师学校的诸多校区之一。在这里，充满希望的电子人们研究关于机器精神争论的艺术。
Texts.Eng: One of the Hogwash School of Technowizardry's many campuses. Here, hopeful Glitch study the arts of wrangling machine spirits.

Texts.Chs: 非法矿井
Texts.Eng: Outlaw Mine

Texts.Chs: 莱西亚舰队
Texts.Eng: The Lethia Fleet

Texts.Chs: 星际间规模最大的快餐连锁店，连锁店超过83千万亿家。
Texts.Eng: The largest fast-food franchise in the galaxy. More than 83 Quadrillion Served.

Texts.Chs: 这群富含矿物质的小行星吸引了一些众星之子中的不法之徒，他们在上面进行非法开采。
Texts.Eng: This cluster of mineral-rich asteroids has attracted some novakid outlaws into staking an illegal claim to them.

Texts.Chs: 武装平台
Texts.Eng: Weapons Platform

Texts.Chs: 你肯定听说过关于一些与世隔绝的鲛人的传说，他们仍认为鲛人-叶族战争正在持续。猜猜它们从未收到过消息，嗯？
Texts.Eng: You hear stories of Hylotl isolated in space who still believe they're fighting the Floran-Hylotl war. Guess they never got the message, huh?
